error.message: Call to deprecated constant REQUEST_TIME: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal::time()->getRequestTime();

The spaceless tag in "modules/contrib/personalization_by_terms/templates/visited-terms-content-add-list.html.twig" at line 17 is deprecated since Twig 2.7, use the "spaceless" filter with the "apply" tag instead. See https://drupal.org/node/3071078.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
